channel.title: The Forest
channel.description:
[url=http://survivetheforest.com/]The Forest Website - Check for updates[/url] Release Date: May 2014
This game is a mutant/infected open world horror survival game.
Features: - Base Building: The game is very much like Rust in the aspect of base building. - Unique Survival: You're able to set traps with devastating effects on the infected. Hunting actually looks like it'll fun to do, standing knee deep in water with a spear ready is how it should be done in every game. - Open World: Well I really cbf typing up a full review, just watch the trailers.
Trailers [spoiler]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4qTtVMM3uqQ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KwImGYR2rwg https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o9mr4k9X6c8[/spoiler]

item.title: The Forest
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Bump. Game is utter shit. devs barely update, and game is complete after 10 hours of gameplay. Very upset.

Some bugs have been around for a fucking year now. Such a good game with such potential. sad.

Read full topic

item.title: The Forest
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Game is out and it’s brilliant. Cannot save the game atm but hopefully they’ll be done with that before the next build - which has countdown on the main menu btw

item.title: The Forest
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

The Forest Website - Check for updates
Release Date: May 2014

This game is a mutant/infected open world horror survival game.

Features:

  • Base Building: The game is very much like Rust in the aspect of base building.
  • Unique Survival: You’re able to set traps with devastating effects on the infected. Hunting actually looks like it’ll fun to do, standing knee deep in water with a spear ready is how it should be done in every game.
  • Open World: Well I really cbf typing up a full review, just watch the trailers.

Trailers
[spoiler]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4qTtVMM3uqQ
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KwImGYR2rwg
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o9mr4k9X6c8[/spoiler]
